text: Yesli by vse derev'ya na zemle stali per'yami, a k obil'noy vode okeana pribavilas' by voda yeshcho semi okeanov i prevratilas' v chernila, chtoby zapisat' Slova Allakha, to ikh ne khvatilo by, a slova Allakha ne issyakli by. Poistine, Allakh - Velik, Vsemogushch! On - Mudr i o kazhdoy veshchi vedayet, i Yego slovesa i mudrost' nikogda ne issyaknut
